OrgName.entry: HEELEY CITY FARM - LIFE AT NO 5: THE SHEFFIELD VICTORIAN STREET PROJECT

Desc.entry: Project running in partnership with the University of Sheffield's Archaeology Department to excavate Heeley City Farm. The dig took place in summer 2009 and 2010. Follow-up work, including an oral history project, is currently being carried out. Contributions are welcomed, please contact for details.
